name: Candy Smash-Cookie Mania
description:
Most Most popular match 3 game ever!
Endless delicious desserts and sweets!
Exciting game and relax in the journey!
New Version With New Modes
Cutiest match 3 game ever!

What adventure will a cute monster meet on a candy island?
Challenging stages,fantastic candy,attractive music
smoothy touching,and original strategy of matching.
Brings new breeze of match 3 game to players.

Hundreds of stages elaborate balaced between difficulty and gameplay.
Tens of items leads to chain,explosion,exchaging and upgrading.
Four huge planet with different styles.
Rivals with different characters.
Specialized gold stages with feelings of gold rushing.

Once you play, you can't stop!
You'll receive bonus everyday,remember to play everyday.
What are you waiting for? Come on download & play!
